import React, { FC, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAngleDown, faAngleUp, faStar } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import '../../styles/Product/Product.css' interface ProductProps { windowWidth: number, allProducts: any, product: any } const Product: FC = ({ windowWidth, allProducts, product }) => { const [category, setCategory] = useState('') const [relatedProducts, setRelatedProducts] = useState([]) const roundedNum = Math.round(product.rating.rate) const productColorOptions = ["white", "black", "gray", "blue", "yellow", "navy", "red", "purple"] const productSizeOptions = ["XXS", "XS", "S", "M", "L", "XL", "XXL"] useEffect(() => { if (product.category === "men's clothing") { setCategory("Men") setRelatedProducts(allProducts.filter((product: any) => product.category === "men's clothing")) } else if (product.category === "women's clothing") { setCategory("Women") setRelatedProducts(allProducts.filter((product: any) => product.category === "women's clothing")) } else if (product.category === "jewelery") { setCategory("Jewelery") setRelatedProducts(allProducts.filter((product: any) => product.category === "jewelery")) } }, [allProducts, product]) return (
    Home / {category} /
  1. {product.title}

{product.title}

= 1 ? 'fullStar' : 'emptyStar'}`} icon={faStar} /> = 2 ? 'fullStar' : 'emptyStar'}`} icon={faStar} /> = 3 ? 'fullStar' : 'emptyStar'}`} icon={faStar} /> = 4 ? 'fullStar' : 'emptyStar'}`} icon={faStar} /> = 5 ? 'fullStar' : 'emptyStar'}`} icon={faStar} /> ({product.rating.count})
{productColorOptions.map((color, index) => (
))}

) } export default Product
